title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed with a resist medium on plain weave foundation; immersion dyed in blue
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 60.5 x 27 cm (23 13/16 x 10 5/8 in.)
Repeat H: 26 cm (10 1/4 in.)
description: White pattern on a blue background. Vertically symmetrical pattern of swags gathered together with flowers and a tassel to form a grid enclosing two branches, each with a bird.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed with a resist medium on plain weave foundation; immersion dyed in blue. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-100.
